ControlLogic

类 TacticsLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • ControlLogic.TacticsLogic

  • public class TacticsLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    class TacticsLogic is to define the methods used to calculate the tactics data the ai need and several procedure they need to excute such as the calculation of the missle launch envelope, Identification friend or foe and implementation of command guide of missle
    作者:
    WangShuzheng

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TacticsLogic() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void AutoCommand(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is used set Command order to guide missles which have command guide function by AI
      static void AutoHeadTurning(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is turn the helmet aimer by AI
      static boolean AvoidCrash(Aircraft aircraft)
      this procedure is used to prevent the aircraft from crashed on the ground it will return true and excute the procedure when aircraft is below 2000 and continues going down
      static ExternalLoad ChooseMinRangeWeapon(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is used to choose a proper weapon to use the best weapon is the weapon whose envelop covered the target and has the min lauch range
      static double DragCorrection(ExternalLoad missle)
      calculate a coefficient by Drag of a missle and the drag of the refernce drag, which is helpful to calculate the missle launch envelope
      static double EstimateMissleLauchEnvelope(ExternalLoad missle, Object target)
      calculate the missle launch envelope, which is helpful to choose the proper weapon by ai
      static boolean IsEnemy(Object A, Object B)
      this method is used to determind the relationship between A and B
      static double MissleImpulsePerGravity(ExternalLoad missle)
      calculate the ImpulsePerGravity of a missle(totalImpulse/Gravity), which is helpful to calculate the missle launch envelope

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TacticsLogic

        public TacticsLogic()

    • 方法详细资料

      • IsEnemy

        public static boolean IsEnemy(Object A,
                              Object B)
        this method is used to determind the relationship between A and B
        参数:
        A - an object
        B - another object
        返回:
        true if they are enemy

      • MissleImpulsePerGravity

        public static double MissleImpulsePerGravity(ExternalLoad missle)
        calculate the ImpulsePerGravity of a missle(totalImpulse/Gravity), which is helpful to calculate the missle launch envelope
        参数:
        missle - the missle used for calculate
        返回:
        ImpulsePerGravity of missle

      • DragCorrection

        public static double DragCorrection(ExternalLoad missle)
        calculate a coefficient by Drag of a missle and the drag of the refernce drag, which is helpful to calculate the missle launch envelope
        参数:
        missle - the missle used for calculate
        返回:
        DragCorrection coefficient

      • EstimateMissleLauchEnvelope

        public static double EstimateMissleLauchEnvelope(ExternalLoad missle,
                                                 Object target)
        calculate the missle launch envelope, which is helpful to choose the proper weapon by ai
        参数:
        missle - the missle used for calculate
        target - The target to be attacked
        返回:
        the max launch range when the missle is used to attack the target

      • AvoidCrash

        public static boolean AvoidCrash(Aircraft aircraft)
        this procedure is used to prevent the aircraft from crashed on the ground it will return true and excute the procedure when aircraft is below 2000 and continues going down
        参数:
        aircraft - the aircraft who excute this procedure
        返回:
        true if this procedure is needed

      • ChooseMinRangeWeapon

        public static ExternalLoad ChooseMinRangeWeapon(Aircraft aircraft,
                                                Object target)
        this procedure is used to choose a proper weapon to use the best weapon is the weapon whose envelop covered the target and has the min lauch range
        参数:
        aircraft - the aircraft who excute this procedure
        target - The target to be attacked
        返回:
        FinalWeapon the weapon selected

      • AutoCommand

        public static void AutoCommand(Aircraft aircraft,
                               Object target)
        this procedure is used set Command order to guide missles which have command guide function by AI
        参数:
        aircraft - the aircraft who excute this procedure
        target - The target to be attacked

      • AutoHeadTurning

        public static void AutoHeadTurning(Aircraft aircraft,
                                   Object target)
        this procedure is turn the helmet aimer by AI
        参数:
        aircraft - the aircraft who excute this procedure
        target - The target to be attacked
